articles.title: Sunil Gavaskar's Blunt Ajinkya Rahane Reminder As Indian Batters Struggle Against South Africa - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Ajinkya Rahane was part of India's WTC final 2023 squad but didn't get the nod for the tour of South Africa.
articles.content: The Indian cricket team didn't get off to the finest of starts on Day 1 of the first Test against South Africa, with KL Rahul emerging as the only batter to score a half-century. Had it not been for … [+1692 chars]
